org.hackystat.sensorshell.command
Class AutoSendCommand

java.lang.Object
  org.hackystat.sensorshell.command.Command
      org.hackystat.sensorshell.command.AutoSendCommand

public class AutoSendCommand
extends Command

Implements the AutoSend facility, which automatically sends all SensorData to the Sensorbase at regular intervals as specified in the sensor.properties file.

Author:
Philip Johnson

Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize()
Sets the AutoSend time interval and buffer size from the sensor.properties file.

setTimeInterval

public void setTimeInterval(java.lang.String interval)
Process an AutoSendTimeInterval command, given a list whose first argument is the auto send

Parameters:
interval - An integer that specifies the interval in minutes for sending data.

setTimeInterval

public void setTimeInterval(double minutes)
Initializes the autosend time interval to the number of specified minutes. If 0, then autosend is disabled.

Parameters:
minutes - The minutes.

setBufferSize

public void setBufferSize(java.lang.String buffSizeString)
Process an AutoSendBufferSize command, given a string containing the max buffer size.

Parameters:
buffSizeString - An integer that specifies the maximum buffer size before sending data.

setBufferSize

public void setBufferSize(int bufferSize)
Initializes the autosend buffer size to the number indicating the maximum buffer size before invoking a send command.

Parameters:
bufferSize - The buffer size.
